title: The American President (1995) Michael Douglas (DVDrip)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0112346/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0112346/</a>

With Annette Bening, Martin Sheen and Michael J. Fox

Already a classic comedy-drama about the widowed US president and a lobbyist who fall in love. All rips seem to have vanished from the PirateBay where only a full DVD remains, so I found this good rip on the net and thought it should be represented here.

Note: This is not my rip. As the MediaInfo analysis below shows, BVOP and QPEL have been used (B-frames and Quarter-pixel motion compensation), so the file may give problems in older standalone DivX players. Convert it with DrDivX or ConverXtoDVD if you have to.

However, the file runs without problems in Windows Media Player on my computer, and in my new standalone DivX player.

Widescreen 624x258, good stereo.
